ROOT.ds0: SELECT RECORDDATE,FORECASTALARMCONTENT,CASE FORECASTALARM WHEN 1 THEN '预警' ELSE '报警' END AS FORECASTALARM, CASE MONITORINGTYPE WHEN '024005' THEN 'SF6气体水分' WHEN '024004' THEN 'SF6气体压力' WHEN '022001' THEN '油位(电容器(耦合电容器))绝缘监测' WHEN '024002' THEN '分合闸线圈电流波形' WHEN '024003' THEN '负荷电流波形' WHEN '024006' THEN '储能电机工作状态' WHEN '024001' THEN '断路器/GIS局部放电' WHEN '021004' THEN '铁芯接地电流' WHEN '023001' THEN '金属氧化物避雷器绝缘' WHEN '021001' THEN '主变压器局部放电' WHEN '021002' THEN '油中溶解气体' WHEN '021007' THEN '主变压器振动波谱' WHEN '021003' THEN '微水' ELSE '顶层油温' END AS MONITORINGTYPE FROM DEVICEPARAM.ONLINEMONITORINGSTATUS WHERE DEVICENAME={0} AND RECORDDATE >= {{1}} AND RECORDDATE <={{2}} ORDER BY RECORDDATE
